author: felicity
msg: found that the score as shown in the report wasn't lining up properly
if abs(score) >= 10.  modified the layout to fix it.

author: felicity
msg: bug 1907: if SA is installed into a non-standard location, and the modules
are called by a third party set of programs that don't pass in PREFIX,
the modules will probably not be able to figure out where the rules and
such are.  added a make-time PREFIX default setting to SA.pm such that
if PREFIX isn't passed in, the modules can at least make an educated
guess about where to find the rules and such.

author: felicity
msg: bug 1959: try to clean up mass-check's parallelization function to stop "going out to lunch".
